Reference

Package

gammaMatrix

gammaMatrix: Asymptotic Covariance Matrix of Covariances

Gamma Matrix Functions

gammacap()

Asymptotic Covariance Matrix

gammacap_adf() gammacap_adfunbiased()

Asymptotic Distribution-Free Covariance Matrix

gammacap_adfnb()

Nonparametric Bootstrapped Asymptotic Distribution-Free Covariance Matrix

gammacap_gen()

Asymptotic Covariance Matrix (General)

gammacap_mvn()

Asymptotic Covariance Matrix Assuming Multivariate Normal Data

gammacap_ols()

Asymptotic Covariance Matrix for Ordinary Least Squares Regression

gammacap_ols_generic()

Asymptotic Covariance Matrix for Ordinary Least Squares Regression - Generic

gammacap_ols_hc()

Asymptotic Covariance Matrix for Ordinary Least Squares Regression with Sandwich Type Adjustments

gammacap_ols_hc_generic()

Asymptotic Covariance Matrix for Ordinary Least Squares Regression with Sandwich Type Adjustments - Generic

gammacap_ols_hc_qcap()

Leverage Adjustment

gammacap_ols_hc_qcap_generic()

Leverage Adjustment - Generic

gammacapnames()

Dimension Names for the Gamma Matrix

Multivariate Normal Distribution Functions

rmvn_chol()

Generate Data from the Multivariate Normal Distribution Using the Cholesky Decomposition

Linear Algebra Functions

dcap()

Duplication Matrix

kcap()

Commutation Matrix

sym_of_vech()

Symmetric matrix A from vech(A)

vech()

Half-Vectorize

vechnames()

Vector Names for Half-Vectorization
